title: Alert
description: Security alert generated by the Bastión Xólot detection pipeline

device_id.description: MAC address or device UUID of the involved device

severity.description: Alert severity — drives UI priority and recommended urgency

title.description: Short human-readable summary (shown in alert list)

explanation.description: Plain-English description of what happened and why it matters

evidence.description: Machine-readable supporting data for correlation and display

source_module.description: Detection module that produced this alert

recommended_action.description: Plain-English suggested next step for the user

related_event_ids.description: Event IDs that contributed to this alert
